ExperimentVariant.title: ExperimentVariant
ExperimentVariant.description:
Experiment Variant

* run: An experiment based on a process run, where the reference is time and has start and end time
* samples: An experiment based in samples, where the reference is a sampleId (no start and end time)

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: Type of variable, indicates this is a flow variant.

references.title: References
references.description: List of variable references for flow variant.

references.description: List of variable references for flow variant.

FlowType.description:
Enum for Flow Type

* conti: Continuous
* mbolus: Massbolus
* bolus: Single bolus
* perfusion: Perfusion
* bleed: Bleed
* sampling: Sampling

ModelExperiment.title: ModelExperiment
ModelExperiment.description: DataHowLab Experiment represented in a Model's dataset

startingTimestamp.title: Startingtimestamp
startingTimestamp.description: Timestamp (in seconds) marking the starting point of the prediction

modelConfidence.title: Modelconfidence
modelConfidence.description: Value of confidence interval of the predictions, in percentage (between 1 and 99)

ModelReference.title: ModelReference
ModelReference.description: Reference for model (Only for Combined Model)

ModelStatus.title: ModelStatus
ModelStatus.description:
Enum for Model Status

* new: Training is pending
* running: Training is progressing
* failed: Training has failed
* cancelled: Training was cancelled by the user
* success: Training was successful

ModelType.title: ModelType
ModelType.description:
Model Type Enum

* propagation: A propagation model predicts timeseries of measured variables from a recipe
* historical: A historical model predicts final CQAs from complete timeseries of a finished experiment
* combined: A combined model predicts both timeseries and CQAs from a recipe

group.title: Group
group.description: Variable group, e.g. X, W, Z, Y, Feeds

variant.description: Variable variant, determines data point type and extra meta-data

inputType.description: Indicates whether/how the variable is used as model input

outputType.description: Indicates whether/what data will be predicted by the model

disposition.title: Disposition
disposition.description: Model-specific indicator of how a variable is used by the model

* MICRO: Microbial culture
* MRNA: mRNA production

ProcessUnitCode.title: ProcessUnitCode

* SPC: Spectroscopy
* IVT: In Vitro Transcription
* PTC: Post-Transcriptional Capping

RawExperimentData-Input.title: RawExperimentData
RawExperimentData-Input.description:
Raw experiment data as a root model mapping Variable UUID -> RawDataModel.
Serializes to a single JSON object of variable UUID keys (no nested 'data').

VariableInputType.title: VariableInputType
VariableInputType.description:
Variable Input Type

* none: not an input type
* scalar: single scalar value
* initialTimeseries: initial timeseries values provided until first timestamp that is predicted
* fullTimeseries: full timeseries data

VariableOutputType.title: VariableOutputType
VariableOutputType.description:
Variable Output Type

* none: not an output variable
* scalar: single scalar value
* fullTimeseries: full timeseries data

measurementId.title: Measurementid
measurementId.description: ID of the measurement associated with the variable reference

concentrationId.title: Concentrationid
concentrationId.description: ID of the concentration associated with the variable reference

name.title: Name
name.description: Full display name of the variable.

description.title: Description
description.description: Extra verbose description of the variable.

VariableVariant.title: VariableVariant
VariableVariant.description:
Enum for variable variants - data type per data point

* flow: Numerical (float) data for feeds/flows
* numeric: Numerical (float)/float data
* categorical: Categorical (string) data
* logical: Logical (boolean) data i.e. "true"/"false"
* spectrum: Spectra (array of floats) data

VariantSpectrumXAxis.title: VariantSpectrumXAxis
VariantSpectrumXAxis.description: Pydantic model for variant spectrum x axis

VariantSpectrumYAxis.title: VariantSpectrumYAxis
VariantSpectrumYAxis.description: Pydantic model for variant spectrum y axis
